item.title: How to Download Ration Card Online
item.description: How to Download Ration Card Online From Birth to Death! Government Documents / Services - Guidebook Step-by-Step Process Step 1: Access the Portal To download a ration card online, those belonging to Tamil Nadu should go to the website https://www.tnpds.gov.in/. Step 2: Login On the left side of the website, click on the ‘Beneficiary Login’ option. Step 3: Enter Details Then, enter the mobile number linked to the ration card in the field.
